itemDescription: English Renaissance composer and church musician

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Appleby (c. 1488 – 1563) was Informator Choristarum at Magdalen College, Oxford from 1539 until 1541, where he was succeeded by John Sheppard. Appleby was also the organist and instructor of the choristers at Lincoln Cathedral from 1538 to 1539 and from 1541 to 1562.

response: **Thomas Appleby, church musician and composer (born c.1488)
* Thomas Appleby appointed organist and choirmaster at Lincoln Cathedral
*Thomas Appleby (composer) (c. 1488–1563), English Renaissance composer and church musician
